source: Secretary of Human Services Grants Paying Account
destination: Arkansas Department of Human Services – Purchase of Services
statutory_basis:
Section 8 of HB1105 authorizes the Secretary of Human Services to use grants paying funds for purchase‑of‑service
payments.  The section appropriates one hundred twenty‑nine thousand eighty‑four dollars ($129,084) for that
purpose【935954631752484†L623-L640】.
